title: Vintage Handwriting Examples
content:
I went to a Stamp Collectors Show over the weekend and snapped a bunch of photos for reference. Unfortunately the lighting wasn't great, and everything was under gross plastic, but i think some of you will still find them useful.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/13659176@N00/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200816/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/13659176@N00/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/13659176@N00/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200816im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1573498622_f3e306d93b_o_6424.jpg)
author: HaleyFiege
